Welcome to 24 Hours Welcome %1$s,\nI am H-Bot Your 24H Guide.\n\nWe need to gather some information about your interests\nto create a more enjoyable experience. Sounds Good! Maybe Later Create Username Saving Username\\nJust a sec....
Default Make Your own Ectomorph Endomorph Mesomorph Select A Body type Ectomorphs are characterized as having long, slim, and thin muscles/limbs and low fat storage. Ectomorphs are not predisposed to store fat nor build muscle. Mesomorphs are the “lucky ones.” They have medium bones, solid torso, low fat levels, wide shoulders with a narrow waist. Endomorphs play the game of Weight Loss on extreme difficulty. These are people with wider waists, large bone structures, and are predisposed to storing fat instead of building muscle.
Chest Back Arms Shoulder Quads Calves Core

By selecting \'Setup event\', \nYou will be teleported to an event creator zone which has been optimized based on your age,\n but hey don\'t worry you can also add your own event.\nIf you don't have time now do it later via the skip button. To reset your password just enter your email, press the "Reset Password" Button and check email to follow instruction ☺ Hey There, This is 24H.GM A.K.A Gym. Ever want to create a workout plan for your daily/weekly trip to the Gym?\n Here you have the ability to choose our default Gym plan our create one of you're very own. YOu can also View Workout Plans Made by the Community. Hi again, 24H.S is A Social organizer, where you create events for common social activities,\n You want to set up a plan to go to the Cinema well you can, or How about create a Budget for your grocceries, 24H.B$ allows you to just that. 24H.SP allows you to create a study plan for any day of the week, fast and simple. Create an ordinary plan for an ordinary day.
